title: Stargazey pie
description: Stargazey pie is a classic Cornish dish of pilchards covered in a pastry crust. Tristan Welch's version uses sardines covered in a rich mustard sauce and topped with puff pastry.
ingredients: 250g/9oz all-butter puff pastry, rolled to 3-4mm thick
4-8 Cornish sardines, filleted, carcasses and heads reserved
